channel.title: Trapdoors, Gates, And ladders [pi]
channel.description: Could someone tell me how to get all -Trapdoors -Gates -Ladders To work? I tried everything, im desperate. Please mopar!

item.title: Trapdoors, Gates, And ladders [pi]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:477474”]I don’t know why I came to this topic thinking it was minecraft.

Anyways, you need to make a case in clickobject or actionhandler, to go to the coordinates that they go to(For ladders it’s usually just one height up, and for trapdoors it’s usually somewhere deep in the wilderness.[/quote]
Please. Please oh no. You said it.

Just use my post in rune-server

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/help/464555-opening-doors-individually-through-actionhandler.html#post3803356

Convert it to trapdoors and gates of course.

For ladders, do the array part but instead just do c.heightLevel++;

Read full topic

item.title: Trapdoors, Gates, And ladders [pi]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I don’t know why I came to this topic thinking it was minecraft.

Anyways, you need to make a case in clickobject or actionhandler, to go to the coordinates that they go to(For ladders it’s usually just one height up, and for trapdoors it’s usually somewhere deep in the wilderness.

Read full topic
